fields.Title of Presentation: What's on your mind? Mindfulness works
fields.Conference Location: Employee Learning and Development Classroom Boise State U Boise, ID
fields.Description/Abstract:
This presentation will describe the effects of Mindfulness on the body-mind-spirit with an emphasis on healthy self-care practices.

Practical techniques for mindful self-care will be presented with interactive participation.  Marty will review research, application, limits and benefits of mindfulness.

Practicing self-care with mindfulness, breath work, imagery, light massage, and other calming methods the learner will discover relaxation techniques that they may wish to indulge in on a regular basis.

Presenter:  Marty Downey, PhD, RN, AHN-BC, HTPA, CNE - Associate Professor, School of Nursing
